title: Citi Global Consumer Banking CEO Stephen Bird to Present at Deutsche Bank's 2018 Global Financial Services Conference
summary: New York - Stephen Bird, Chief Executive Officer of Citi's Global Consumer Bank, will present at Deutsche Bank's 2018 Global Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, May 29, 2018. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 11:30 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
